skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Great Grumbler
skillTree.description: Well don't gawk at it, dreng it!

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Toughen Up
skillTree.description: It is a Rik's duty to lead his fellow Dawi into battle.

skillTree.name: Like You Mean it!
skillTree.description: Never pass up an opportunity to relieve a Grobi head from its filthy body.

skillTree.name: Sparring Partner
skillTree.description: You'll need some Bugman's after this.

skillTree.name: Rorkaz
skillTree.description: Perhaps one day you'll win.

skillTree.name: Got
skillTree.description: Get a move on!

skillTree.name: Grimak
skillTree.description: Only the most foolish would dare stand against you.

skillTree.name: Gnollengrom
skillTree.description: Few have ever cultivated such a spectacular beard.

skillTree.name: Valaya's Will
skillTree.description: Even a Dawi who lives and breathes war will honor the goddess of Home and Hearth.

skillTree.name: That'll do Dawi
skillTree.description: Now then, what's all this complainin'? There'll be none of that in my throng!

effects.description: Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Dokak
skillTree.description: I have the eyes of a hawk and the ears of a fox.

skillTree.name: Itchy Beard
skillTree.description: The beard always knows.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Reckoner
skillTree.description: There'll be no drinkin' nor feastin' till every last bit of gal is accounted for!

skillTree.name: Keeper of the Gate
skillTree.description: One bound by an oath to defend fights all the harder, gladly giving his life rather than face the dishonour of failure.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Hammerers units

skillTree.name: Ironbeard
skillTree.description: Deep-tunnel warfare requires one to become comfortable standing closer to explosions than is perhaps sensible.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Flammable!" that lowers movement speed and adds weakness to fire
Ammunition: +50% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes, Ironbreakers and Miners units

skillTree.name: Wanderer
skillTree.description: Long periods spent tracking foes far from the safety of the Holds makes experts at approaching enemies from unexpected angles.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Shield
skillTree.description: In my time there were none as tough as I. With my help, perhaps you'll come close. (This skill line is Belegar campaign only)

skillTree.name: An Honour No Doubt
skillTree.description: You've no doubt heard of me. Now stay out of my way and you might learn a thing or two.

skillTree.name: Get Your Shields Up Dawi!
skillTree.description: Rangers or not, where we're goin' you're gonna want those shield arms to be strong and ready.

skillTree.name: Venerated Thane
skillTree.description: You'll all do well to pay attention.

skillTree.name: No Dawi Left Behind
skillTree.description: Your clans-dwarfs call for aid. Will you let them die like ufdi, or will you answer their call like Dawi?

skillTree.name: For the Clan
skillTree.description: Back in my day serving your clan was of the utmost importance.

skillTree.name: Utilize the Sparring Chambers
skillTree.description: Any of you worth your mettle will meet me in the chambers and we'll see what you're made of.

skillTree.name: Bristling Beards
skillTree.description: Think that's going to bring me down? You'll rue the day!

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
